Package gw.cc.financials.entity

Interface RITransactionSet

public interface RITransactionSet
A set of RI transactions.

    Modifier and Type

  • Method Details

    • newCededReserve

      RICededReserve newCededReserve(RIAgreement agreement, ReserveLine reserveLine, BigDecimal claimAmount, boolean isAdjustment)
      Adds a new RICededReserve to this RITransactionSet. It will:
      • be on the specified RIAgreement
      • be on the Exposure of the specified ReserveLine
      • have its Claim set up based on the Exposure
      • have the CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency of the specified ReserveLine
      • be set up with an RICoding matching those values, which will either be found in the db or bundle or be created
      • have the specified ClaimAmount
      • have a ClaimToReportingExchangeRate selected from the current market rates, or null if server in single-currency mode
      • have a ReportingAmount calculated based on the ClaimAmount and selected exchange rate, or copied from the ClaimAmount in single-currency mode
      • have the specified "adjustment" flag value
      • have a Status of Submitting
      • have its LifeCycleState transitioned from New to Committed, creating corresponding RITAccountTransactions
      The bundle and claim of the arguments must match the bundle and claim of this RITransactionSet. None of the arguments may be null.
      Parameters:
      agreement - the RIAgreement of the transaction to be created; this must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet; this must be in the same RIAgreementGroup as the exposure
      reserveLine - the transaction to be created will have it's Exposure, CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency properties set to those of this ReserveLine. The Exposure must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet and also must be on the agreement's RIAgreementGroup
      claimAmount - the ClaimAmount of the transaction to be created; the ReportingAmount will be based on this
      isAdjustment - the value of the Adjustment flag for the transaction to be created
      Returns:
      the new RICededReserve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if agreement and exposure are not in this RITransactionSet's bundle or if the RIAgreementGroup doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if the Exposure doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if claimAmount's amount has too much precision for its Currency or if any of the arguments are null

    • newRecoverable

      RIRecoverable newRecoverable(RIAgreement agreement, ReserveLine reserveLine, BigDecimal claimAmount, boolean isAdjustment)
      Adds a new RIRecoverable to this RITransactionSet. It will:
      • be on the specified RIAgreement
      • be on the Exposure of the specified ReserveLine
      • have its Claim set up based on the Exposure
      • have the CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency of the specified ReserveLine
      • be set up with an RICoding matching those values, which will either be found in the db or bundle or be created
      • have the specified ClaimAmount
      • have a ClaimToReportingExchangeRate selected from the current market rates, or null if server in single-currency mode
      • have a ReportingAmount calculated based on the ClaimAmount and selected exchange rate, or copied from the ClaimAmount in single-currency mode
      • have the specified "adjustment" flag value
      • have a Status of Submitting
      • have its LifeCycleState transitioned from New to Committed, creating corresponding RITAccountTransactions
      The bundle and claim of the arguments must match the bundle and claim of this RITransactionSet. None of the arguments may be null.
      Parameters:
      agreement - the RIAgreement of the transaction to be created; this must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet; this must be in the same RIAgreementGroup as the exposure
      reserveLine - the transaction to be created will have it's Exposure, CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency properties set to those of this ReserveLine. The Exposure must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet and also must be on the agreement's RIAgreementGroup
      claimAmount - the ClaimAmount of the transaction to be created; the ReportingAmount will be based on this
      isAdjustment - the value of the Adjustment flag for the transaction to be created
      Returns:
      the new RIRecoverable
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if agreement and exposure are not in this RITransactionSet's bundle or if the RIAgreementGroup doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if the Exposure doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if claimAmount's amount has too much precision for its Currency or if any of the arguments are null

    • newCededReserve

      RICededReserve newCededReserve(RIAgreement agreement, ReserveLine reserveLine, BigDecimal claimAmount, boolean isAdjustment, ExchangeRate claimToReportingExchangeRate, BigDecimal reportingAmount)
      Adds a new RICededReserve to this RITransactionSet. It will:
      • be on the specified RIAgreement
      • be on the Exposure of the specified ReserveLine
      • have its Claim set up based on the Exposure
      • have the CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency of the specified ReserveLine
      • be set up with an RICoding matching those values, which will either be found in the db or bundle or be created
      • have the specified ClaimAmount
      • have the specified ClaimToReportingExchangeRate
      • have the specified ReportingAmount (if the specified ReportingAmount is null, then ReportingAmount is calculated from the ClaimAmount and ClaimToReportingExchangeRate)
      • have the specified "adjustment" flag value
      • have a Status of Submitting
      • have its LifeCycleState transitioned from New to Committed, creating corresponding RITAccountTransactions
      The bundle and claim of the arguments must match the bundle and claim of this RITransactionSet. Apart from reportingAmount, none of the arguments may be null. This method may only be called when the server is running in multicurrency mode.
      Parameters:
      agreement - the RIAgreement of the transaction to be created; this must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet; this must be in the same RIAgreementGroup as the exposure
      reserveLine - the transaction to be created will have it's Exposure, CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency properties set to those of this ReserveLine. The Exposure must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet and also must be on the agreement's RIAgreementGroup
      claimAmount - the ClaimAmount of the transaction to be created
      isAdjustment - the value of the Adjustment flag for the transaction to be created
      claimToReportingExchangeRate - the ClaimToReportingExchangeRate of the transaction to be created; the base and price currencies of this ExchangeRate must be the claim and reporting currencies
      reportingAmount - the ReportingAmount of the transaction to be created; this argument may be null, in which case a ReportingAmount is computed using claimAmount and claimToReportingExchangeRate
      Returns:
      the new RICededReserve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if agreement and exposure are not in this RITransactionSet's bundle or if the RIAgreementGroup doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if the Exposure doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if either of the amount arguments have too much precision for its Currency or if claimToReportingExchangeRate has incorrect currencies or if any of the arguments (other than reportingAmount) are null
      IllegalStateException - if the server is running in single-currency mode

    • newCededReserve

      RICededReserve newCededReserve(RIAgreement agreement, ReserveLine reserveLine, BigDecimal claimAmount, boolean isAdjustment, RIClaimToReportingExchangeRateInUse claimToReportingExchangeRate, BigDecimal reportingAmount)
      Adds a new RICededReserve to this RITransactionSet. It will:
      • be on the specified RIAgreement
      • be on the Exposure of the specified ReserveLine
      • have its Claim set up based on the Exposure
      • have the CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency of the specified ReserveLine
      • be set up with an RICoding matching those values, which will either be found in the db or bundle or be created
      • have the specified ClaimAmount
      • have the specified ClaimToReportingExchangeRate
      • have the specified ReportingAmount (if the specified ReportingAmount is null, then ReportingAmount is calculated from the ClaimAmount and ClaimToReportingExchangeRate)
      • have the specified "adjustment" flag value
      • have a Status of Submitting
      • have its LifeCycleState transitioned from New to Committed, creating corresponding RITAccountTransactions
      The bundle and claim of the arguments must match the bundle and claim of this RITransactionSet. Apart from reportingAmount, none of the arguments may be null. This method may only be called when the server is running in multicurrency mode.
      Parameters:
      agreement - the RIAgreement of the transaction to be created; this must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet; this must be in the same RIAgreementGroup as the exposure
      reserveLine - the transaction to be created will have it's Exposure, CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency properties set to those of this ReserveLine. The Exposure must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet and also must be on the agreement's RIAgreementGroup
      claimAmount - the ClaimAmount of the transaction to be created
      isAdjustment - the value of the Adjustment flag for the transaction to be created
      claimToReportingExchangeRate - the RIClaimToReportingExchangeRateInUse of the transaction to be created; the from and to currencies of this exchange rate must be the claim and reporting currencies
      reportingAmount - the ReportingAmount of the transaction to be created; this argument may be null, in which case a ReportingAmount is computed using claimAmount and claimToReportingExchangeRate
      Returns:
      the new RICededReserve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if agreement and exposure are not in this RITransactionSet's bundle or if the RIAgreementGroup doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if the Exposure doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if either of the amount arguments have too much precision for its Currency or if claimToReportingExchangeRate has incorrect currencies or if any of the arguments (other than reportingAmount) are null
      IllegalStateException - if the server is running in single-currency mode

    • newRecoverable

      RIRecoverable newRecoverable(RIAgreement agreement, ReserveLine reserveLine, BigDecimal claimAmount, boolean isAdjustment, ExchangeRate claimToReportingExchangeRate, BigDecimal reportingAmount)
      Adds a new RIRecoverable to this RITransactionSet. It will:
      • be on the specified RIAgreement
      • be on the Exposure of the specified ReserveLine
      • have its Claim set up based on the Exposure
      • have the CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency of the specified ReserveLine
      • be set up with an RICoding matching those values, which will either be found in the db or bundle or be created
      • have the specified ClaimAmount
      • have the specified ClaimToReportingExchangeRate
      • have the specified ReportingAmount (if the specified ReportingAmount is null, then ReportingAmount is calculated from the ClaimAmount and ClaimToReportingExchangeRate)
      • have the specified "adjustment" flag value
      • have a Status of Submitting
      • have its LifeCycleState transitioned from New to Committed, creating corresponding RITAccountTransactions
      The bundle and claim of the arguments must match the bundle and claim of this RITransactionSet. Apart from reportingAmount, none of the arguments may be null. This method may only be called when the server is running in multicurrency mode.
      Parameters:
      agreement - the RIAgreement of the transaction to be created; this must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet; this must be in the same RIAgreementGroup as the exposure
      reserveLine - the transaction to be created will have it's Exposure, CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency properties set to those of this ReserveLine. The Exposure must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet and also must be on the agreement's RIAgreementGroup
      claimAmount - the ClaimAmount of the transaction to be created
      isAdjustment - the value of the Adjustment flag for the transaction to be created
      claimToReportingExchangeRate - the ClaimToReportingExchangeRate of the transaction to be created; the base and price currencies of this ExchangeRate must be the claim and reporting currencies
      reportingAmount - the ReportingAmount of the transaction to be created; this argument may be null, in which case a ReportingAmount is computed using claimAmount and claimToReportingExchangeRate
      Returns:
      the new RIRecoverable
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if agreement and exposure are not in this RITransactionSet's bundle or if the RIAgreementGroup doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if the Exposure doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if either of the amount arguments have too much precision for its Currency or if claimToReportingExchangeRate has incorrect currencies or if any of the arguments (other than reportingAmount) are null
      IllegalStateException - if the server is running in single-currency mode

    • newRecoverable

      RIRecoverable newRecoverable(RIAgreement agreement, ReserveLine reserveLine, BigDecimal claimAmount, boolean isAdjustment, RIClaimToReportingExchangeRateInUse claimToReportingExchangeRate, BigDecimal reportingAmount)
      Adds a new RIRecoverable to this RITransactionSet. It will:
      • be on the specified RIAgreement
      • be on the Exposure of the specified ReserveLine
      • have its Claim set up based on the Exposure
      • have the CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency of the specified ReserveLine
      • be set up with an RICoding matching those values, which will either be found in the db or bundle or be created
      • have the specified ClaimAmount
      • have the specified ClaimToReportingExchangeRate
      • have the specified ReportingAmount (if the specified ReportingAmount is null, then ReportingAmount is calculated from the ClaimAmount and ClaimToReportingExchangeRate)
      • have the specified "adjustment" flag value
      • have a Status of Submitting
      • have its LifeCycleState transitioned from New to Committed, creating corresponding RITAccountTransactions
      The bundle and claim of the arguments must match the bundle and claim of this RITransactionSet. Apart from reportingAmount, none of the arguments may be null. This method may only be called when the server is running in multicurrency mode.
      Parameters:
      agreement - the RIAgreement of the transaction to be created; this must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet; this must be in the same RIAgreementGroup as the exposure
      reserveLine - the transaction to be created will have it's Exposure, CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency properties set to those of this ReserveLine. The Exposure must be in the same bundle as this RITransactionSet and also must be on the agreement's RIAgreementGroup
      claimAmount - the ClaimAmount of the transaction to be created
      isAdjustment - the value of the Adjustment flag for the transaction to be created
      claimToReportingExchangeRate - the ClaimToReportingExchangeRate of the transaction to be created; the from and to currencies of this exchange rate must be the claim and reporting currencies
      reportingAmount - the ReportingAmount of the transaction to be created; this argument may be null, in which case a ReportingAmount is computed using claimAmount and claimToReportingExchangeRate
      Returns:
      the new RIRecoverable
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if agreement and exposure are not in this RITransactionSet's bundle or if the RIAgreementGroup doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if the Exposure doesn't have the same Claim as this RITransactionSet or if either of the amount arguments have too much precision for its Currency or if claimToReportingExchangeRate has incorrect currencies or if any of the arguments (other than reportingAmount) are null
      IllegalStateException - if the server is running in single-currency mode
